title: Open a wormhole to my inbox
subtitle: If you’ve read this far, we’re basically friends. Drop a message—I'll respond faster than a build pipeline that *actually* caches.

cards.title: Hire Me (I come with logs)
cards.desc: Need someone who ships, measures, and fixes what breaks? I’m your person.

cards.title: Collab (let’s cause a good incident)
cards.desc: Hackathon, open-source, weird experiments, galaxy UI—I'm in.

cards.title: Coffee Chat (no small talk)
cards.desc: Tell me what you’re building. I’ll tell you what will break first.

footerNote: PS: If you send “hello”, I will reply with a meme and a roadmap.
